backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing party ledger backend with party/payment management, visit records with location tracking, filtering/pagination, user profiles, shop branding, access control via mixins, and data import/export functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features including hybrid authentication, search functionality, event categories, notification center, and their associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend source files covering React components, hooks, utilities, and pages for party management, authentication, payments, branding, reports, and analytics.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI elements like background, foreground, primary, secondary, destructive, borders, charts, and sidebar components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Party Ledger app with Leaflet and MarkerCluster CSS imports for map functionality, mounting React app to #root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring QueryClient, router with routes for dashboard/parties/reports/analytics/settings/visits/map, wrapped in providers for theme/actor session/admin auth/notifications, with admin credential prompting and upcoming event checking.
frontend/src/components/admin/AddAdminPr: Dialog component for adding admin principals with Principal ID validation, form submission using useAddAdminPrincipal mutation, error handling, and loading states.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPrinc: Admin panel for managing admin principals with add/remove functionality, displays table of admin users with their principal IDs and status, enforces at least one admin must remain.
frontend/src/components/alerts/DueTodayD: Alert dialog that displays parties with payments due today, allows navigation to individual party details.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Catego: Pie chart component that visualizes event distribution across categories parsed from visit comments.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Metric: Dashboard cards displaying key metrics: total parties, total events, upcoming events count, and total due amount.
frontend/src/components/analytics/PartyE: Horizontal bar chart showing top 10 parties by visit count for engagement analysis.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Full-screen error page displayed when user lacks permissions to access a resource.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminCreden: Modal dialog for admin credential entry with username/password fields, supports session re-authentication and skip option for view-only access.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootstrapEr: Error screen shown when application initialization fails, provides retry and reload options.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginScreen: Landing page with Internet Identity login button for user authentication.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileBoot: Error screen displayed when user profile fails to load, offers retry and reload functionality.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog for first-time user profile setup, collects user name and saves to backend.
frontend/src/components/auth/StartupLoad: Simple loading screen with spinner and customizable message displayed during app initialization.
frontend/src/components/auth/TopLevelErr: React error boundary component that catches top-level errors and displays a self-contained error UI with reload functionality, using inline styles to avoid dependency on app providers.
frontend/src/components/branding/Brandin: Header component that displays shop logo and name from branding settings, with fallback to default logo and 'Party Ledger' name.
Settings card for managing shop branding including name and logo upload with progress tracking, using ExternalBlob for file uploads and toast notifications for feedback.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/TodayN: Dashboard card displaying parties with payments due today, showing party details with call and navigation buttons, limited to 5 items with link to view all in reports.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Upcomi: Calendar-based payment reminder component with date picker to view parties with payments due on selected date, showing party details with call and navigation actions.
frontend/src/components/import/ExcelPart: Card component for bulk importing parties from Excel files with preview, batch processing (10 at a time), progress tracking, and detailed success/failure reporting.
Main application layout shell with branding header, navigation menu for all routes, notification bell, logout functionality, and footer with caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/notifications/No: Renders a bell icon button with an unread notification badge that opens a popover containing the NotificationCenter component.
Displays a scrollable list of notifications with icons, timestamps, and actions to mark as read, dismiss individually, or clear all; clicking a notification navigates to the associated party page.
frontend/src/components/parties/PartyFor: A dialog form for adding or editing party records with admin authentication checks, auto-generating party IDs, and validation for required fields like name and PAN.
frontend/src/components/payments/Payment: A dialog form for recording payments with amount, comment, and optional next payment date fields; requires next payment date when amount is zero.
Displays a list of payment records with payment IDs and indicators for location tracking and next payment date availability.
frontend/src/components/settings/Princip: Shows the authenticated user's Internet Identity Principal ID in a read-only input with a copy-to-clipboard button for sharing with administrators.
frontend/src/components/transfer/JsonTra: Provides UI for exporting all application data to JSON and importing data with options to either merge with or overwrite existing records.
frontend/src/components/visits/PartyVisi: Dialog component for recording party visits with payment amount, comment, next payment date, visit datetime, and optional geolocation capture.
frontend/src/context/ActorSessionContext: React context providing authenticated actor instance, loading states, and a stable principal key for query invalidation across the app.
frontend/src/context/AdminAuthContext.ts: React context managing admin authentication with hardcoded credentials (username: 'rajan', password: 'Admin@123'), validation, and session state.
frontend/src/context/NotificationContext: React context managing in-app notifications (upcoming, new, updated) with localStorage persistence, read/dismiss tracking, and duplicate prevention.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminPrinc: React Query hooks for managing admin principals (get, add, remove) and checking caller admin status, with temporary type extensions for unregenerated backend methods.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAuth.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and saving the current user's profile (name) via the actor session.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useBranding.t: React Query hooks for getting and setting shop branding (name and logo) with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useMapLocatio: React Query hook fetching party visit location data filtered by date range, validating coordinates, and aggregating visit counts for map visualization.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useParties.ts: Provides React Query hooks for party management including fetching all parties, getting individual parties, validating/generating party IDs, and adding/updating parties with admin authentication checks.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/usePayments.t: Exports React Query hooks for fetching party payment records and recording payments/visits, with automatic cache invalidation across multiple related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useStaffPermi: Stub file indicating staff authentication has been removed; exports no-op hooks for backward compatibility.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useTodayDashb: Provides a hook to fetch and aggregate today's visit entries across all parties, calculating total visits and amounts with automatic refresh every minute.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useTodayNotif: Fetches parties with payments due today, enriching them with party names and phone numbers, with automatic refetch every minute.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useTransfer.t: Provides hooks for exporting and importing upgrade data with automatic query invalidation after import.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useUpcomingPa: Fetches parties with upcoming payments for a selected date by analyzing visit records and filtering by next payment date.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorSafe.ts: Similar to useActor but with explicit error handling, retry logic, and exposed loading/error states for safer actor initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useDueTodayAlert.ts: Simplified stub hook for due-today alerts with dismissal functionality; actual implementation disabled to avoid performance issues.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useUpcomingEventCheck: Custom hook that polls for party payment records due within 24 hours and triggers notifications for upcoming payments.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme colors, including primary, secondary, destructive, and chart color definitions.
frontend/src/lib/categories.ts: Defines event categories (Birthday, Wedding, Corporate, etc.) with associated color schemes and utility functions for validation and formatting.
frontend/src/lib/categoryParser.ts: Encodes and parses event categories embedded in comment strings using a special marker format (##CATEGORIES:...##).
frontend/src/lib/excel/parsePartiesFromE: Parses CSV files to extract party data (name, address, phone, PAN, due amount) with validation and error reporting for each row.
frontend/src/lib/export/csvExport.ts: Exports parties and events to CSV format with proper escaping and triggers browser downloads with timestamped filenames.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Utility functions for formatting and parsing monetary amounts in Indian Rupees, phone numbers, and PAN numbers.
frontend/src/lib/phone.ts: Normalizes phone numbers and creates tel: protocol links for click-to-call functionality.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Converts between JavaScript Date objects and backend Time (nanosecond bigint), with formatting and datetime-local input string utilities.
frontend/src/lib/transfer/jsonTransfer.t: Handles JSON export/import of UpgradeData with bigint serialization, file parsing, and merging logic for party and visit records.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AllPartiesListPage.ts: Displays a sortable, alphabetical list of all parties with their names, addresses, and phone numbers using the useGetAllParties hook.
frontend/src/pages/AnalyticsPage.tsx: Analytics dashboard showing metrics summary cards, category pie chart, and party engagement chart using data from parties and visit records.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Fast view dashboard displaying today's notifications, upcoming payments calendar, visit count, and total received amount with a list of recent visits.
Identifies and displays potential duplicate party records by grouping parties with the same name (case-insensitive) and showing their details for review.
frontend/src/pages/MapPage.tsx: Interactive map page using Leaflet and MarkerCluster to display party visit locations with date range filtering and authentication checks.
frontend/src/pages/NewPartyVisitPage.tsx: Party selection page with search functionality that opens a PartyVisitFormDialog when a party is selected to record a new visit.
frontend/src/pages/PartiesPage.tsx: Displays a searchable, filterable list of all parties with cards showing balances and contact info; includes admin-only add party button and CSV export functionality.
frontend/src/pages/PartyDetailsPage.tsx: Shows detailed information for a single party including contact details, balance, and payment history; provides admin-only edit/delete actions and dialogs for adding payments and visits.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Advanced analytics page that displays detailed payment history and statistics for a selected party, including location tracking, payment averages, and comprehensive visit records.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Tabbed settings interface with sections for profile, branding, data import/export, data health tools (duplicate detection), and admin-only principal management.
frontend/src/pages/VisitDetailsPage.tsx: Displays detailed information about a specific party visit/payment including amount, date/time, comments, next payment date, and location with map link.
frontend/src/utils/staffSession.ts: Empty utility file, likely placeholder for staff session management functionality.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system with CSS variables, container settings, border radius utilities, Inter font family, accordion animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state document describing a party/event management system with hybrid authentication (Internet Identity + admin credentials: rajan/Admin@123), featuring search/filtering, event categories, in-app notifications, reporting dashboards, and CSV/PDF export functionality.
